name: Wizard time!
description:
It's ”Wizard time!” – hardcore platformer with puzzle elements. Use different spell books and your skills to complete levels!

Play as a wise Wizard who is searching for ancient spells. His way is full of dangerous traps and evil orcs – collect spell books to learn new magic and pass hardcore puzzle levels! Find what he is looking for!

Game Features:
  • Use unique spell magic and your brains
  • Pass handmade puzzle levels
  • And find all secrets!

Only wise and clever player can complete the game. Accept the challenge!
